content:
Define Validation Status Picklist Values

When the Validation Status field is enabled on the Knowledge Settings page, you can create picklist values that show the state of the article. For example, values could be Validated, Not Validated, or Needs Review.

Available in: Salesforce Classic and Lightning Experience.

Salesforce Knowledge is available in Essentials and Unlimited Edition with Service Cloud. In Professional, Enterprise, Performance, and Developer Editions, it's available for an additional cost.

To create or change validation status picklist values: Customize Application

In Salesforce Classic, to add new values: Enter Validation Statuses in the Quick Find box, select Validation Statuses, click New, add one or more picklist values (one per line), set as default if needed, and Save. 

When you replace a picklist value, it replaces it in all versions of the article.

Salesforce Knowledge Help and Resources
title: Defining Validation Status Picklist Values in Salesforce
